precondition_slang:
Given I have a 'time' named 'timestamp'
Given I have a 'string' named 'precondition_keys_path'
Given I have a 'string' named 'executed'
# timestamp
When I set '5 min' to '300' as 'time'
When I create the result of 'timestamp' + '5 min'
When I remove 'timestamp'
When I create the timestamp
When I verify number 'timestamp' is less than 'result'
# executed
When I set 'false' to 'false' as 'string'
When I verify 'executed' is equal to 'false'
When I remove 'executed'
When I set 'executed' to 'true' as 'string'
When I create the 'string dictionary' named 'precondition_data'
When I move 'timestamp' in 'precondition_data'
When I move 'precondition_keys_path' in 'precondition_data'
When I move 'executed' in 'precondition_data'
Then print the string 'OK'
Then print the 'precondition_data'
Then I send path 'precondition_keys_path' and send content 'precondition_data' and store in file
